product_summary: 80days is an AI-powered trip planning app that helps users create multi-destination itineraries with ease. The app uses machine learning to analyze actual travel data and provides optimized routes, transportation options, and recommendations for accommodations and activities.
product_cons: May not be suitable for complex or highly customized itineraries
Potential for errors or inaccuracies in AI-generated recommendations
Can be more expensive than booking directly with travel providers

product_usecases.use_case: Planning a multi-city trip to Europe
product_usecases.details: 80days can help you create an optimized itinerary, including flights, trains, and ferries, and book all your accommodations and activities in one place.

product_usecases.use_case: Finding the best deals on flights and accommodations
product_usecases.details: 80days uses machine learning to analyze real-time data and provide you with the best prices on flights and accommodations.
80days takes into account your preferences, budget, and interests to provide you with personalized travel recommendations.

product_toolfor.details: 80days is designed for independent travelers who want to plan their own trips and avoid the hassle of booking multiple flights, accommodations, and activities.
80days can help you find the best deals on flights and accommodations, making it a great option for budget-conscious travelers.
80days can save you a lot of time by automatically generating optimized itineraries and booking all your travel arrangements in one place.
80days is a great tool for travel enthusiasts who want to explore new destinations and get personalized travel recommendations.
80days can help business travelers plan efficient and cost-effective trips.

product_pricing: 80days offers a subscription-based pricing model. The basic subscription costs $10 per month and includes access to all of the app's features. The premium subscription costs $20 per month and includes additional features such as personalized travel recommendations, priority support, and exclusive discounts.
